title: My Best Selling LGBTQ+ Children’s Book: Johnny the Walrus
description:
I have accomplished many things in my lifetime, but recently I made one of my ultimate dreams come true. I wrote a children's book called Johnny the Walrus, and it's taking the LGBTQ+ community by storm. The book is a timely tale of innocence, identity, and imagination – and it’s back in stock now. Reserve your copy of Johnny the Walrus today: https://utm.io/ud1j6.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
